article_title: Hill's underdog bid for Senate overshadowed by Indiana governor's race

article_metadata.news_keywords: , underdog, evan bayh, larry bird, john mellencamp, todd young, dan coats, andrew downs, donald trump, joe donnelly, marlin stutzman, richard lugar, john gregg, baron hill
article_metadata.author: Maureen Hayden | CNHI State Reporter | Indianapolis

og.description: A five-term former congressman, Baron Hill has previously scored with voters who know him for an on-court reputation that saw him inducted into the state Basketball Hall of Fame alongside
